projects.title: Holistic Mental Health Services Office Sign
projects.shortDescription: Welcoming office suite signage with calming design
projects.longDescription: Professional office suite signage for Holistic Mental Health Services featuring calming colors and welcoming design. The sign creates an approachable first impression while maintaining professional credibility, perfectly aligning with their mental wellness brand identity.
projects.challenge: Creating signage that feels welcoming and reduces stigma around mental health services while meeting professional office building standards and ADA compliance requirements.
projects.solution: Designed elegant dimensional lettering with calming color accents and soft, rounded letterforms. The sign uses high-quality brushed aluminum with a subtle blue accent color that matches their brand identity.
projects.impact: The welcoming signage helped clients feel comfortable visiting the office, contributing to positive first impressions and reduced anxiety for new patients seeking mental health support.

testimonial.text: The office signage perfectly represents our practice - welcoming, professional, and calming. Clients often comment on how the sign makes them feel at ease before they even enter.
testimonial.author: Kristie Doheny

projects.title: Laura's Beauty Touch Salon Sign
projects.shortDescription: Elegant illuminated salon signage with luxury appeal
projects.longDescription: A sophisticated illuminated storefront sign for Laura's Beauty Touch featuring elegant script typography and premium LED lighting. The sign creates a luxurious presence that attracts discerning clientele while maintaining visibility day and night.
projects.challenge: Creating signage that conveys the luxury, elegance, and personal touch of Laura's high-end beauty services while ensuring maximum visibility in a competitive retail environment.
projects.solution: Designed custom LED channel letters with elegant script typography and warm lighting. The sign features gold-toned metal finish with halo illumination creating a premium glow effect that's visible 24/7.
projects.impact: The elegant signage significantly increased walk-in traffic, helped justify premium pricing, and established Laura's Beauty Touch as the premier beauty destination in the area.

specifications.lighting: Warm white LED with halo effect

testimonial.text: The sign is absolutely stunning! It perfectly captures the luxury experience we provide. We've seen a significant increase in walk-in clients who say they were drawn in by our beautiful signage.
testimonial.author: Laura Sholomov
